PageTitle: display mpls te gmpls tunnel-interface last-error
FuncDef: The display mpls te gmpls tunnel-interface last-error command displays last errors occurring on a GMPLS UNI tunnel interface of the local node.
CLIs: display mpls te gmpls tunnel-interface last-error [ <gmpls-tunnel-name> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a GMPLS UNI tunnel.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te gmpls tunnel-interface last-error
LSP Type   : Primary LSP               LSP ID     : 1.1.1.1:1:12
Error Info : Path Err, Error Node 0.0.0.0, Error LsrId 1.1.1.1,
RSVP failed to set up the LSP.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls te gmpls tunnel-interface last-error command displays last errors that occur on an ingress EN or are carried in packets sent by an egress EN of a GMPLS UNI tunnel.
